goal.ch: 建立學生對電機機械磁能轉換的概念，瞭解如何分析磁能轉換裝置之動作原理，並將此原理應用至電動機、發電機與變壓器。同時，基於電路學與電磁學的概念，建立磁能轉換裝置之等效電路模型，更進一步瞭解如何運用與控制磁能轉換裝置。
goal.en: The objective of this course is to build the concepts in sufficient depth so that students can understand the principles of electromagnetic energy conversion which can be applied to the electric machines including the motors, generators and transformers. Simultaneously, based on the circuit and electromagnetic theories, students could learn to construct the equivalent model of electric machines and further understand how to manipulate and control the electromagnetic energy conversion devices.

outline.ch: 主要介紹電機機械的基本原理，包括磁能轉換、變壓器、電動機與發電機等裝置，並瞭解如何運用這些裝置在日常生活中。
outline.en: The basic principles of electric machinery are introduced including the electromagnetic energy conversion, transformers, motors and generators. In addition, the characteristics and applications of those electromagnetic energy conversion devices are described in this course.
